div.div: Our Mission is to empower students with the knowledge, skills, and values to become productive participants in a changing world. A caring staff will encourage students to accept personal responsibility, undertake civic participation, prepare for future careers, and develop a life-long love of learning.

img.title: Yellowjacket
img.alt: Quarter 4 Updates for Families and Students

div.a: Quarter 4 Updates for Families and Students

br.span: Please see Mr. Brindley's latest update about change in closure dates and an added meal distribution site.

p.span: As we continue to support our community’s essential workers and adhere to Governor Cuomo’s Executive Order 202.4, I am writing to share an important change in the process of facilitating childcare for the families of essential workers during this period of school closure.

b.span: Employees of the Oneonta City School District would like your assistance with showing our Health Care and EMS Workers that "We Care" about the sacrifices they're making on a daily basis.

br.span: From Superintendent Brindley: I wanted to share updates from Governor Cuomo as well as the New York State Board of Regents.
